name: Liar Trick: Psychological Crime Mystery
storyline:
You will interrogate all suspects to determine anything "suspicious" about their given testimonies.
However, not all of them are guilty. Deduce the meaning of each expression to find the lies and facts of each case. Only then can you reveal the Truth.
summary: Are all your expressions "real"? The content of a person's words can be both truthful or false. In this new psychological crime mystery game you will unveil "lies" through emotions! You can play Visual Novel Stories, Facial Expression Analysis Mode, Liar mode, and Deduction Mode.
